HR & Admin Officer Job at Owens & Xley Consults




        
    

        
        Owens & Xley Consults - Our client, a full-service Construction firm, is seeking to hire a competent and dedicated individual to join its team in the capacity below:

Job Position: HR & Admin Officer
Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Construction / Engineering

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking an experienced HR & Admin Officer to lead and oversee all human resources, administrative, and compliance functions of our organization.
	The ideal candidate will combine strategic HR leadership with strong administrative and compliance management skills to drive organizational efficiency, ensure regulatory adherence, and foster a positive workplace culture.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement HR strategies aligned with business objectives.
	Draft, review, and enforce HR and administrative policies and procedures.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, company policies, and regulatory requirements.
	Oversee recruitment, onboarding, and talent management processes.
	Manage employee relations, performance appraisals, and disciplinary procedures.
	Lead and supervise the administrative team, ensuring smooth office operations.
	Oversee payroll, benefits administration, and HR reporting.
	Manage office facilities, vendor relationships, and procurement processes.
	Develop and monitor HR, admin, and compliance KPIs and metrics.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in HR and administrative management, including compliance oversight.
	Strong knowledge of labor laws, HR best practices, and regulatory compliance.
	Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in HRIS, MS Office, and other relevant tools.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 monthly

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@owensxley.com using “HR & Admin Officer” as the subject of the email.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Executive Assistant",
  "description": "HRecruitershub is a private company into Human Resources and Advisory Service.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Executive Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Industry: Financial Institution

About The Role


	The Executive Assistant has the overall responsibility of providing high-level administrative support to the CEO, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations of the office.
	The individual serves as the primary point of contact for internal and external interactions on all matters pertaining to the Office of the CEO and a liaison to senior management teams; organizes and coordinates external relations efforts; overseas and works independently on special projects from conception to completion.
	The position requires an individual who is self-directing with minimal supervision, creative, and enjoys working within a small, entrepreneurial environment that is mission and results-driven oriented.
	The EA is expected to be highly organized, proactive, and capable of managing multiple priorities.
